description: Juliette March is made to kneel on wired hot copper sheeting with a copper pipe behind her elbows stringing her elbows high and her arms back. Mistress Lorelei Lee intend on giving Juliette a farewell she'll never forget. She enlists the perfect tool for this moment: the tazer. Sending shock all through Juliette's body, Lorelei is slowing breaking Juliette into a trusting and obedient electro slave. With some ruthless zaps to the tough, she shows Juliette the road to walk down.
title: Tough Little Juliette
